about_me.des: I am a Sophomore at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology studying Computer Science and Electrical Engineering. I am passionate about world-changing technology - from Virtual Reality or Artificial Intelligence to Space Exploration. Always ready to hear interesting ideas and collaborate in projects for local or global communities.

career.boeing_des: At Boeing I worked in the infrastructure team, created data retrieval scripts, and was part of a Mars Rover proposal group.
career.alpha_des: At Alphadyne I strengthened their Firewall security and proposed a logging system to monitor the network.
career.university_des: Started my college career at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology working towards my B.S. in Computer Science.
career.high_school_des: Graduated from Miami Lakes Educational Center with a concentration in Networking through Cisco Networking Academy.
